Package org.konelabs.stroll.graphics

Interface Summary
IGBAGraphicsViewer IScreenViewers will be notified of changes to the screen and will be provided with the screen's buffer to associate with itself
InterruptListener Interface for a Screen's interrupt listener.
 

Class Summary
AbstractGBALayer Represents a screen layer.
AbstractGraphics<DLayer extends AbstractGBALayer> Represents a virtual screen; this base class contains all of the synchronisation methods to maintain a constant speed for the screen as well as managing the interrupts.
GBABitmap  
GBAGraphics Representation of the GBA screen hardware.
GBAGraphicsCanvas A ScreenCanvas is used to display an instance of Screen and, storing the back buffer's pixels.
GBALayer Represents a background layer emulating the GBA backgrounds.
 

Enum Summary
GBALayer.Mode BGLayer mode type
